label: clinical_signal_03_dx_pain_management_trial_028
content:
## 2024-09-09 Daily Operations Summary

### Enrollment
- Total Enrolled: 107
- Active: 94
- Screen Failures Cumulative: 60
- Withdrawals Cumulative: 13

### Enrollment By Treatment Arm
- Multimodal: 36
- Standard: 35
- Placebo: 36

### Efficacy By Arm
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score Mean: 4.6
- Multimodal VAS Pain Score SD: 1.8
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 23.9
- Multimodal Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 10.4
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 373.0
- Multimodal Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 55.0
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 27.8
- Multimodal Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.3
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index Mean: 6.0
- Multimodal Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 1.7
- Multimodal Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.1

- Standard VAS Pain Score Mean: 5.6
- Standard VAS Pain Score SD: 1.7
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 39.9
- Standard Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 7.9
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 326.0
- Standard Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 42.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 24.0
- Standard Grip Strength (kg) SD: 3.5
- Standard Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.7
- Standard Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 4.8
- Standard Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 2.5

- Placebo VAS Pain Score Mean: 6.2
- Placebo VAS Pain Score SD: 1.3
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) Mean: 49.3
- Placebo Morphine Equivalents (mg) SD: 5.1
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) Mean: 271.0
- Placebo Six Minute Walk Test (meters) SD: 48.0
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) Mean: 19.1
- Placebo Grip Strength (kg) SD: 5.4
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index Mean: 4.1
- Placebo Sleep Quality Index SD: 1.2
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week Mean: 7.0
- Placebo Rescue Med Doses per Week SD: 1.5

### Physical Therapy
- Sessions Scheduled: 224
- Sessions Attended: 168
- Attendance Rate (%): 82.9

### Safety Labs
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) Mean: 13.6
- Hemoglobin (g/dL) SD: 0.9
- WBC (k) Mean: 8.0
- WBC (k) SD: 1.7

- ESR (mm/hr) Mean: 10.0

### Adverse Events
- AE ID: PM-AE-2851, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: unlikely related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2806, Description: constipation, Grade: 2, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2831, Description: dizziness, Grade: 1, Relatedness: possibly related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal
- AE ID: PM-AE-2854, Description: nausea, Grade: 1, Relatedness: probably related, Resolved: true, Treatment Arm: multimodal

### Protocol Deviations
- PD ID: PM-PD-2821, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: moderate
- PD ID: PM-PD-2841, Description: Missed physical therapy session, not rescheduled within window, Severity: moderate

### Events
- Site 06 monitoring visit completed, 1 findings
- Site 08 monitoring visit completed, 2 findings
- Rescue medication supply restocked at 22 sites

### Notes
- Week 28: Pain management assessments on track. 107 subjects enrolled across treatment arms. Functional outcomes within expected ranges.
